The story was also published on a known: satirical" website, suggesting that it was not intended to be taken seriously.
The details of the story were inconsiste: with different versions of the suspect's name, location, and occupation being reported on different websites.
The use of unrelated photographs: such as a mugshot of a former police officer and a picture of the suspect's "parents" taken from a different news article, further cast doubt on the authenticity of the claim.
